articles.title: What's next for the video game industry as Nintendo launches the long-awaited Switch 2 - NPR
articles.summary: What's next for the video game industry as Nintendo launches the long-awaited Switch 2 NPR's Ayesha Rascoe asks journalist Jeff Gerstmann what's next for gaming now that the Nintendo Switch 2 is finally in stores.
